forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
